info.name: PlayAsport User & Public API
info.description: Complete API collection for User and Public endpoints - includes User Authentication, Participants, Bookings, Notifications, Public Academy browsing, Search, Locations, Sports, Facilities, Banners, CMS Pages, Reels, Highlights, Home, and Settings

item.name: User Authentication

request.description: Send OTP to a mobile number for login or registration. Works for both existing and non-existing users.
Verify OTP for login or registration. If user exists, returns tokens. If not, returns tempToken for registration.
Register a new user with temporary token verification (issued after OTP verification). Mobile number is extracted from tempToken for security.
Login or register a user via social providers (Firebase - Google, Facebook, Instagram, Apple).
Get current authenticated user profile. Requires USER role authentication.

formdata.description: Profile image file (JPEG, PNG, WebP, max 5MB)

request.description: Update user profile details. Supports profile image upload via multipart/form-data. Requires USER role authentication.
Update user address. Requires USER role authentication.
Change user password. Requires USER role authentication.
Update user's favorite sports. Requires USER role authentication.
Refresh access token using refresh token. Device-specific tokens are validated against device records.
Logout user (blacklist current tokens). Requires USER role authentication.
Logout from all devices (blacklist all user tokens). Requires USER role authentication.

item.description: User authentication endpoints for registration, login, profile management, and token management

item.name: Participants

formdata.description: Optional profile photo file (JPEG, PNG, WebP)

request.description: Create a new participant. Users can only create participants for themselves. Supports profile photo upload. Requires authentication.
Get paginated list of participants for logged-in user. Requires authentication.
Get participant by ID. Users can only view their own participants. Requires authentication.

formdata.description: Optional profile photo file (JPEG, PNG, WebP). Old photo will be deleted if new one is uploaded.

request.description: Update participant details. All fields are optional. Users can only update their own participants. Supports profile photo upload. Requires authentication.
Delete participant (soft delete). Users can only delete their own participants. Requires authentication.

item.description: Participant management endpoints for users. Requires USER role authentication.

item.name: Bookings

request.description: Get booking summary including batch details, participant info (with age), and calculated amount before creating an order. Requires authentication.
Create a booking request (new flow). This will occupy slots, create a booking with SLOT_BOOKED status, and send notifications to academy, user, and admin. Requires authentication.
Get paginated list of user's bookings with enrolled batches, participants, and payment details. Shows all bookings regardless of payment status. Requires authentication.
Get detailed booking information by booking ID. Requires authentication.
Create a Razorpay payment order for an approved booking. The booking must be in APPROVED status. Requires authentication.
Verify Razorpay payment signature and update booking status. Use this after successful payment on frontend. Requires authentication.
Cancel a booking with optional reason. Requires authentication.
Cancel a booking order and mark payment status as failed. Only works for orders with pending payment status. Requires authentication.

Download invoice PDF for a booking with successful payment. The invoice is automatically sent to the user's email when payment is verified successfully. Requires authentication and booking ownership. Payment status must be SUCCESS. Returns PDF file as binary data with Content-Type: application/pdf.

item.description: User booking management endpoints for creating bookings, managing payments, viewing booking history, and downloading invoices. Requires USER role authentication.

item.name: User Notifications

request.description: Get paginated list of notifications for the authenticated user. Requires USER role authentication.
Get count of unread notifications for the authenticated user. Requires USER role authentication.
Mark a specific notification as read. Requires USER role authentication.
Mark a specific notification as unread. Requires USER role authentication.
Mark all notifications as read for the authenticated user. Requires USER role authentication.
Delete a specific notification. Requires USER role authentication.

item.description: User notification endpoints for viewing and managing notifications. Requires USER role authentication.

item.name: Public - Academies

request.description: Get all published academies with pagination. If location is provided, academies are sorted by distance. If user is logged in and has favorite sports, academies with favorite sports are prioritized. This is a public endpoint.

variable.description: Academy ID (UUID, ObjectId, or User custom ID)

request.description: Get detailed information about an academy including all batches. Supports multiple ID types. If user is not logged in, email and mobile number will be masked. This is a public endpoint.
Get list of academies in a specific city with sport-specific data and images. Returns academies with one image from sport_details per academy. This is a public endpoint.
Get academies that offer a specific sport. If location is provided, academies are sorted by distance (nearest first) and distance is shown in km. This is a public endpoint.
Get top 15 cities with academy and sports counts. This is a public endpoint.

item.description: Public academy browsing endpoints. No authentication required.

item.name: Public - Location

request.description: Get all countries. This is a public endpoint.
Get states by country. This is a public endpoint.

query.description: State ID (MongoDB ObjectId or state reference ID)

request.description: Get cities by state ID. This is a public endpoint.

item.description: Public location endpoints for countries, states, and cities. No authentication required.

item.name: Public - Basic

request.description: Get all active sports with name, logo, is_popular, and custom_id. This is a public endpoint.
Get all active facilities with name, description, icon, and custom_id. This is a public endpoint.

item.description: Public basic endpoints for sports and facilities. No authentication required.

item.name: Public - Home

request.description: Get home page data (nearby academies, popular sports, and popular reels). Authentication is optional.

item.description: Public home page data endpoint. Authentication is optional.

item.name: Public - Search

request.description: Autocomplete/Search-as-you-type API. Searches across all indices (sports, coaching centers, reels, highlights) simultaneously. This is a public endpoint.

query.description: User's latitude for geo-based sorting and filtering
User's longitude for geo-based sorting and filtering

request.description: Full-text search across all indices with pagination, geo-filtering, and advanced sorting. This is a public endpoint.

item.description: Public search endpoints for autocomplete and full-text search. No authentication required.

item.name: Public - Banners

variable.description: Banner position (homepage_top, homepage_middle, homepage_bottom, category_top, category_sidebar, sport_page, center_page, search_results, mobile_app_home, mobile_app_category)

query.description: Maximum number of banners to return

request.description: Get active banners for a specific position. Banners are filtered by scheduling, targeting, and sorted by priority. Authentication is optional.
Track banner view (for analytics). This endpoint is optional and failures are silently ignored. Authentication is optional.
Track banner click (for analytics). This endpoint is optional and failures are silently ignored. Authentication is optional.

item.description: Public banner endpoints. Authentication is optional.

item.name: Public - CMS Pages

variable.description: CMS page slug (e.g., privacy-policy, terms-and-conditions, about-us)

query.description: Filter by platform (web, app, both) - optional

request.description: Get an active CMS page by its slug. This is a public endpoint that doesn't require authentication.

item.description: Public CMS page endpoints. No authentication required.

item.name: Public - Reels

request.description: Get paginated list of approved reels (3 per page). This is a public endpoint.

item.name: Get Reels List with ID First

request.description: Get paginated list of reels where the specified reel appears first. This is a public endpoint.
Increment the view count for a specific reel. This is a public endpoint.

item.description: Public reels endpoints. No authentication required.

item.name: Public - Highlights

request.description: Get paginated list of published highlights with minimal data. This is a public endpoint.
Get detailed information about a specific highlight including user, sports, and coaching center data. This is a public endpoint.
Increment the view count for a specific highlight. This is a public endpoint.

item.description: Public highlights endpoints. No authentication required.

item.name: Public - Settings

request.description: Get limited public-facing settings including app name, logo, and contact information only. Returns only essential public data (app_name, app_logo, contact). All other settings are excluded. This is a public endpoint.

item.description: Public settings endpoint. No authentication required.

item.name: Public - Locale

request.description: Get current locale information. This is a public endpoint.
Set locale for current request. Supported locales: en, hi. This is a public endpoint.

item.description: Public locale endpoints. No authentication required.

item.name: Health

request.description: Health check endpoint to verify server is running. This is a public endpoint.

item.description: Health check endpoint. No authentication required.
